column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Great ambience and feel when you walk in
column2: we were asked to wait for a table and decided to have a drink at the bar. The bar tender was the most unpleasant and down right rude staff I've been served by in years. REALLY disappointing as this left a bad taste for the remainder of the night. Her attitude was foul
column3: didn't smile or asked us to repeat our drink order several times. She then went on to roll her eyes and ask for a tip when we requested a split bill.
